thread.title: Nokia 3 and Nokia 5 specs leaked, include 5.2-inch displays and Android Nougat
thread.title_full: Nokia 3 and Nokia 5 specs leaked, include 5.2-inch displays and Android Nougat

title: Nokia 3 and Nokia 5 specs leaked, include 5.2-inch displays and Android Nougat
text:
Nokia 3 and Nokia 5 specs leaked, include 5.2-inch displays and Android... Nokia 3 and Nokia 5 specs leaked, include 5.2-inch displays and Android Nougat   3 and Nokia 5 will feature quad-core Snapdragon SoCs, 2GB RAM and 16GB of storage” 
Earlier today, a report by the popular tipster Evan Blass aka @ evleaks revealed that HMD Global would launch the budget Nokia 3 and Nokia 5 Android smartphones later this month at MWC. Now we have the complete specifications and price of the two devices thanks to Nokiapoweruser . 
As per the source, the Nokia 3 will feature a 5.2 or 5.3-inch HD display. It will be powered by a 1.4GHz quad-core Snapdragon 425 SoC, mated to 2GB of RAM and Adreno 308 graphics. The phone will come with 16GB of expandable storage, Android Nougat, a 13-megapixel primary snapper and a 5-megapixel secondary shooter. 
As for the Nokia 5, the source suggests that it will feature a 5.2-inch HD display, and will utilise a 1.4GHz quad-core Snapdragon 430 processor, coupled with 2GB of RAM and Adreno 505 graphics. The phone will offer 16GB of internal memory, Android Nougat, a 13MP rear snapper and an 8MP front shooter. 
As per the Blass, the entry-level Nokia 3 will be priced at €149 (~Rs 10,500), while the Nokia 5 will set you back by €199 (~ Rs 14,100). They are expected to go on sale in major   in March/April, after an initial unveiling on February 26th at MWC.
